org.smartfrog.sfcore.workflow.eventbus
Interface EventBus

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractCompoundCondition, AndCompoundCondition, Attribute, ConditionCompound, Container, CounterAction, Delay, Deployer, DoNothing, During, EvaluateConditionImpl, EventCompoundImpl, EventCounter, EventPrimImpl, EventQueue, EventRegistrar, EventSend, FileTesterImpl, Finally, FireBreak, GameArenaWrapper, IfImpl, LifecycleTesterImpl, LivenessTestImpl, NotCompoundCondition, OnEvent, OrCompoundCondition, Parallel, ProgressBarsImpl, RandomSequence, Repeat, Retract, Retry, Run, Sequence, SlowStart, Terminator, TestBlockImpl, TestCompoundImpl, Timeout, Try, WaitForImpl, XorCompoundCondition
public interface EventBus

Part of the SmartFlow event infrastructure used to provide simple synchronization between components Defines the extension API for EventPrim and EventCompounds, providing the hooks for a component to send and receive events.

Method Summary
 void sendEvent(java.lang.Object event)
          method which forwards an event to all registered EventSinks.
